oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Video - Memphis Sounds with George Klein - Episode #6
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: television; Klein, George; music; Presley, Elvis; Graceland; Soden, Jack; Davis, Richard; Leigh, Suzanna; Fontana, D. J.; Moore, Scotty; Sun Studio; Nichopoulos, George;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The first annual Elvis tribute episode, featuring multiple clips of Elvis' performances. Guests include Graceland CEO Jack Soden, longtime friend and Memphis Mafia member Richard Davis, co-star Suzanna Leigh, musicians D.J. Fontana and Scotty Moore, and Dr. George "Nick" Nichopoulos.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: WYPL
